Exploring the 2nd Ruins
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Exploring the 2nd Ruins
By Galgos77 on Wednesday, July 19, 2006 - 08:52 am:

When you go to the 2nd ruins after you become a level 3 breeder and your monster gets to B rank. You find something in what looks like a temple, and you have to take it to the studio and the lady that words at the studio says she will take a look at it and she keeps it. What is this thing?

By Fire Activist on Monday, August 7, 2006 - 04:27 pm:

It is needed to unlock the Hengar. Look in the Unlock all Monsters thread.
